mapper.select: select * from friend order by createTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into activity(activityName,`number`,type,introduction,price,startTime,duration,coachId,coachName,is_Delete) values (#{activityName},#{number},#{type},#{introduction},#{price},#{startTime},#{duration},(select id from coach where `name`=#{coachName}),#{coachName},'1')
